item.title: [Python] Let's do difficult things with COTOHA API-Learn by using Introduction to natural language processing-
[Python] Introduction to Python with 100 language processing knocks
item.description: This article is for people who want to get started with natural language processing in Python, with little knowledge of C but little of Python. We are aiming for the shortest route that can solve Chapter 1 of [Language Processing 100 Knock 2015](http://www.cl.ecei.tohoku.ac.jp/nlp100/) which is famous as an introduction to natural language processing. .. (4/8 postscript, Chapter 1 is the same for 2020 version) This Qiita already has a lot of articles about 100 knocks, but I thought that it might be difficult for beginners to learn Python, so I wrote this article.
